mapper.select: SELECT dp.id, dp.departmentName, h.hospitalName, date_format(dp.regDate, '%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(dp.editDate, '%Y-%m-%d') FROM department dp, hospital h WHERE dp.id = #{id} AND dp.hospital_id = h.id

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO department (departmentName, regDate, hospital_id) VALUES (#{departmentName}, now(), (SELECT id FROM hospital WHERE hospitalName = #{hospitalName}))
mapper.update: UPDATE department SET departmentName=#{departmentName}, editDate=now(), hospital_id=(SELECT id FROM hospital WHERE hospitalName = #{hospitalName}) WHERE id=#{id}
